tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was an emergency! My tooth was really hurting. Doctor was prompt and very patiently exploring probable possibilities of pain. 
Very efficient and proper with her diagnosis. Everything explained and done smoothly and efficiently. 
I will be taking my daughter for her braces there soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So with a broken bridge not sure what to do as my previous dentist had shifted base to another city . so google comes to your rescue as usual and was looking for good dental clinic. Came across Aesthetic Dental Clinic, a quick appointment, limited wait and Detailed analysis by Dr. Ritika Arora , who actually matched reviews on google , was very professional at her work and suggested me for implants . 
So I had three extracts and 3 dental implants on the same day sounds scary but the procedure was painless though some discomforts for few days but that‚Äôs a natural. After 4 months the implants were restored with 4 ceramic crowns. And so now I can eat .
Modern clinic , very professional , affordable and the overall experience at Aesthetic smiles dental clinic is good especially for nervous patients like me who tend to neglect dental treatment 
Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for dental implants 
Was looking for a good dental clinic in mumbai , found Dr Ritika online and was quite impressed with her credentials and the reviews on google 
I was struggling with a old broken bridge with missing teeth . On Consultation with Dr Ritika suggested me immediate dental implants.
I had 3 teeth extracted and 3 dental implants place on the same day . The procedure was painless though there was some nagging discomfort for a few days later which is quite normal when you have so much dental work done in one sitting 
After 4 months the dental implants were restored with 4 ceramic crowns. I happy to be back to enjoying my food.
Modern clinic , very professional , affordable and the overall experience at Aesthetic smiles dental clinic is good especially for nervous patients like me who tend to neglect dental treatment 
Highly recommended

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had come to the clinic yesterday for a routine check up and cleaning of my teeth. I had visited the clinic once before and was really satisfied so I came back. But this time I was not really happy as I wanted to clean my teeth which was done but the teeth polishing was not done and also I was charged 1800rs which I feel is too expensive for cleaning of teeth and no polishing as far as I remember the last time I paid was 500 Rs and Dr Ritika was really professional with explaining in details of my dental health. I hope you discuss the charges before hand so patient are mentally prepared .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Writing this after 8 months of my treatment and I have no post treatment problems. I was skeptical at start since I didn't knew about Dr. Ritika and read only the reviews on Practo and decided to make a visit. I stay around 20Kms away from clinic and travelling so far in Mumbai for treatment was worthwhile once I visited the doctor. I had a bad smile due to front broken tooth and with her expertise doctor suggested the right treatment , cleared my doubt and fixed my smile.


Was very happy and satisfied with her work. Very good ambience at the clinic and good hygiene maintained. Felt comfortable taking the treatment without any hassels. I would recommend her for all your dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you Suraj for such a lovely feedback üëç

review: Dr Ritika  & her team were excellent. The attention extended along with their soft skills during the treatment made me feel comfortable & looked after. The clinic is well maintained & very clean. The results what I saw  after my treatment were far beyond my expectation. Thank You Dr Ritika & Team.

review:
The clinic smelled like a sewer. It was unbearable. Dr. Ritika Arora was late for the appointment. She didn't have the courtesy to greet me or introduce herself. And she instructed me to leave my shoes in the reception. 

Not a word of apology for arriving late. No polite request to leave my shoes in the reception.  From the look (and smell) of the clinic and the unprofessionalism that was exhibited, * ***** **** **** ******* *** *** *** ****** ** *** ********** ** ** *** **** ** ******* *****

review: In fact Dr. Ritica  did some interdents   and caps to be done at later stage. I found her work very clean, without any discomfort. Her dexterity was appreciated. She has all modern equipment in her dental clinic aswell. I found  her better dentist than many I have visited.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Ritika Arora has upped the hygiene and safety protocols during Covid not limited to providing shoe covers for all patients footwear. The wait time was minimal and the patient registration process simple. The waiting area was well appointed and there was pleasant music playing. 

The cleaning was very gentle and efficient and I was in and out of there in just about 30 mins.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review:
I think Dr. Ritika is one of the most caring and supportive dentist you could find. She is an expert, relies of her expert doctors team. 

A through professional with a good mind and heart. 

She will tell you as is, explain and its transparency in the treatment process which is her forte.
